channel.title: 55 Windowed palace on Martin's Blog

item.title: Bhaktapur
item.description: Yesterday was spent visiting the local temple in Kathmandu called Swayambhu or Monkey temple in English. Today I decided to venture out further. A friend recommended I see this ancient city with some wonderful architecture. The place is called Bhaktapur and it is about 20-30 min out of Kathmandu. I ordered a proper taxi this time. Even with Kathmandu temperatures at about 25Â°C it was pretty chilly on the bike the previous day when it was warmer.
